member.name: T:Sudoku.UI.CodeGenerating.DefaultValueAttribute
member.summary: Defines an attribute that marks onto a preference property item to tell the source generator that the attribute will help the source generator to generates the property initialization clause, with the default values.

member.name: M:Sudoku.UI.CodeGenerating.DefaultValueAttribute.#ctor(System.String[])
member.summary: Initializes a with the specified values.
member.param: The symbols and the default values.

member.name: P:Sudoku.UI.CodeGenerating.DefaultValueAttribute.SymbolsAndDefaultValues
member.summary: Indicates the symbols and the default values corresponding.

remarks.para:
We use the symbol to tell the source generator the case is the default case. If you want to assign the default value, just use , to assign the property with the default value :
public Preference() { #if DEBUG ... #else Property = null; // Here. #endif }

member.name: T:Sudoku.UI.CodeGenerating.PreferenceItemRouteAttribute
member.summary: Defines an attribute that marks onto a preference item, to tell the source generator that the preference item is bound with a ToggleSwitch, and creates a method that delegated to the XAML file.

remarks.para: Please note that the method is a method, which means you must manually write the declaration into the type.

member.name: M:Sudoku.UI.CodeGenerating.PreferenceItemRouteAttribute.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a instance with the specified control name.

member.name: P:Sudoku.UI.CodeGenerating.PreferenceItemRouteAttribute.ControlName
member.summary: Indicates the bound control name.

member.name: P:Sudoku.UI.CodeGenerating.PreferenceItemRouteAttribute.EffectControlName
member.summary: Indicates the effect control name.

member.name: P:Sudoku.UI.CodeGenerating.PreferenceItemRouteAttribute.PreferenceSetterMethodName
member.summary: Indicates the method name that executes the code, to assign the result.

member.name: T:Sudoku.UI.CodeGenerating.ControlRouting
member.summary: Indicates a routing method that makes the UI control and a preference item become a relation.
member.param: The source generator context on generating source code.
The property name of the preference item.
